line: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness.
title: A Tale of Two Cities
author: Charles Dickens
trivia: This is the best-selling novel of all time, with over 200 million copies soldâ€”more than Harry Potter or The Lord of the Rings.

line: Marley was dead: to begin with.
title: A Christmas Carol
author: Charles Dickens
trivia: Dickens wrote this book in just six weeks because he was broke and needed money to pay off his wife's debts before Christmas.
